AboutPage.sectionQuote: "It´s about doing, not waiting for things to happen by themselves"
AboutPage.introductionText1: Steff, short for Stefan. Born in 1991 in a small town in southern Germany, Bavaria. And yes, you can call me a proud Bavarian too.
AboutPage.introductionText2: What can you expect of me? An open-minded character who seeks to challenge himself. A person who follows his mission: To realize the vision of combining worlds.
AboutPage.introductionText3: But what does that mean? Basically this: It´s about combining the world of being an engineer with the one of being a kitesurf instructor. E voilà, I created my own lifestyle of being a Kite-Engineer. A freelancer that offers services:
AboutPage.introductionListItem1: • that are related to the sport of kiteboarding as well as
AboutPage.introductionListItem2: • in particular fields of engineering like semiconductor manufacturing or IT.
AboutPage.introductionText4: And no, I don´t design kites. Nor am I looking forward to integrate electronics into kites. At least not for now - who knows?
AboutPage.introductionText5: It´s my unique way of dealing with our beloved capitalism: I share what I like doing and you get what you have not yet had before. That makes everyone a winner!
AboutPage.professionalItems:
• Launching my freelancer career as Kite-Engineer to combine my worlds into one, 2025
  • International University (IU) certificate as Python and SQL Programmer, 2025
  • Offering kitesurf lessons in german, english and Portuguese, 2024
  • VDWS kitesurf instructor license, 2023
  • Certified 6 Sigma Green Belt with focus on Lean Management, 2022
  • Private kiteboarding lessons, 2021
  • First contact with kiteboarding, 2018
  • Professional employments as process development engineer, process engineer and laboratory assistant, 2015 - 2024
  • B.Sc. in Microsystems Engineering, 2015
  • Started exploring the areas of micro- and nanosystems in, 2010
AboutPage.personalItems:
• "Be the change in the world you want to see"
  • I am an explorer, an adventurer and a nerd
  • Self-study was always more satisfying then school
  • Yes, even I´ve once played football. Until I was 14
  • Sports and outdoor activities are a big part of my life
  • So is Linkin Park - being a fan since I´m 6 years old
  • Have you ever listened to Eckhart Tolle?
  • Smiling at people on the street helps sharing good vibes
  • Philosophy, especially stoicism, was added since I´m 30 - coincidence?
  • A book that changed my life? O Alquimista - Paulo Coelho
  • Follower of the "Free and Open Source Idea"
  • Growing as a community is satisfaction times x

ContactPage.sectionDescription: Whether it's about kiteboarding, engineering, or anything in between. Reach out via mail, phone or contact form below. Found a bug or typo? I´ll be forever thankful if you report it.

EngineerPage.sectionDescription: Benefit from my engineering services in the fields of IT and semiconductors

processControl.title: Process Control
processControl.description: APC (Advanced Process control), SPC (Statistical Process Control) and WER (Western Electrical Rules) implementation as core competence. Data analytics using Python, AI training for failure detection, dashboards & KPI setup help along the way.

processOptimization.title: Process Optimization
processOptimization.description: Offering 6 sigma and lean techniques to achieve the best possible process outcome you want.

changeManagement.title: Change Management
changeManagement.description: Preparing milestones and passing release gates. It's about documentation and traceability - I do that for you

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.description: Don't know what parameters to monitor and how? Let's define a monitoring setup. And where necessary we find appropriate methods to get a solution for any type of produced volume

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: There is more then brainstorming - but you already know that. Right? Reach out and let´s activate neurons you´ve not yet known about

processDesign.title: Process Design
processDesign.description: You know what your process must achieve but have boundaries locking you into an neverending development cycle? We´ll break it here and now and design what needs to be done. Visualizations and structuring help a lot

simulationPrototyping.title: Simulation and Prototyping
simulationPrototyping.description: Ever considered to use an analogy model and a simulation to solve a problem? What about getting a physical model printed out in 3D? I prepare your project for any kind of further visualization and connect you with experts

processEquipmentRoadmap.title: Process and Equipment Roadmap
processEquipmentRoadmap.description: Your competitors don´t wait for you to catch up. So better be prepared of what may be necessary in the future. I help you to outline what strategies of next generation technology can bring and how to make it beneficial for you.

customizedSolutions.title: Customized Solutions
customizedSolutions.description: Do you want to combine a feature of software A with one of software B and generate an output that fits specific needs? No worries, its just a matter of coffee and time to figure it out. From customized scripts to containerization to front- and and backend integration of custom projects.

databaseManagement.title: Relational Database Management
databaseManagement.description: Wanna go from storing data in files like excel to a more sustainable and better manageable format? Or improve your already existing DB (database)? From setting up a completely new RDBMS (relational database management system) to adjust your DB - I figure it out what we can do.

workflowAutomation.title: Workflow Automatization
workflowAutomation.description: Save time and let software do your repeating tasks. We work out the concept and then implement it step by step, based on your needs. I´m sure a lot of your already used software already supports automatization

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Server and domain related setup? Or wanna have an own Nextcloud? Outsource your web administration to me. And if you need a website too, bring your design and I also manage that for you

projectSetup.title: Project Setup
projectSetup.description: Get more time for other things and let me do the "what shall be delivered until when by whom and how...". Setting things up properly not only gives a good feeling, it also is the foundation to achieve goals sustainable

timelineManagement.title: Timeline Management
timelineManagement.description: It´s all about timing. Sometimes things don´t work out as planed and you need to rebalance your project timelines. Someone with an outside-view like me can help at that stage.

deviationManagement.title: Deviation Management
deviationManagement.description: Especially when external parties are involved it´s not always easy to communicate unexpected detours in your project. Hand it over and get your back covered while you have time to rework a get back into your committed shape.

documentationSharing.title: Documentation and Sharing
documentationSharing.description: Version control and data sharing is not executed on a top level if everyone works on their own devices and only shares on demand. These times are long gone - let´s create synergies in your team that always were there but were never used

processAssessment.title: Process Assessment
processAssessment.description: Get an outside view onto what is running at your business. Detailed feedback on what shall not be changed and what offers potential for improvement and what may be necessary to be done for this.

technicalResearch.title: Topic Related Research
technicalResearch.description: You know there are a lot of things going on around you and you can´t always figure out what to filter how to get to know what matters for you and your business. I like reading technical stuff - let me do this. Why shall we not work together?

trainingKnowledgeTransfer.title: Training & Knowledge Transfer
trainingKnowledgeTransfer.description: I embrace everyone to never stop learning. Thus I am more then willing to share everything I know with you and your business.

competitorAnalysis.title: Competitor Analysis
competitorAnalysis.description: Sure, everyone wants to know what others are up to - why not getting it done professionally and save your time for your business? I scout and report for you.

contactSection.description: Ready to elevate your project? You always get whatever is necessary from my services. The provided overview is meant to be an orientation and only a glimpse of what is possible. Reach out for a free consultation and let's see how we can achieve your goals together.

KitePage.sectionSubtitle: My kiteboarding related services help you to achieve your goals
KitePage.freelancerSchoolSupportDescription: Whether you need a VDWS-certified instructor, shop assistance, or someone to help behind the bar, I've got you covered. Flexibility is my strength.
KitePage.freelancerTravelServicesDescription: Looking for someone how organizes your kite trip? Or even accompanies you as a personal coach? No problem, you get well served
KitePage.freelancerConsultingDescription: Overwhelmed by gear choices? Let me guide you through selecting the right kiteboarding equipment. Need someone to represent the sport? I like talking in front of people and deliver a message to others
KitePage.coursesTheoryDescription: Why not pulling the bar? Let's break down the "science" behind the sport—from wind dynamics to material technology. Choose your topic and pace; I'll make it clear and engaging.
KitePage.coursesStartingDescription: Whether you're beginning a new kite journey or returning after a break, I'll help you (re-)gain confidence on the water.
KitePage.coursesAdvancedDescription: Ready to push limits? From your first toeside ride to nailing loops, let's tackle challenges together. Or you prefer a supervised sessions? No problem! You can as well bring your camera or drone!
KitePage.contactSectionText: You can get a little bit of everything as well. The more you book, the more discount you get. What´s holding you back? Let´s get in touch.

ProcessControlPage.process-control-section-subtitle:
Invest my brainpower into your project and benefit from my
 expertise I gathered while working as a process engineer.
ProcessControlPage.advanced-process-control-list-element1: • Software procurement and setup- You already have lots of process data of your manufacturing processes available but you lack a centralized software that is providing what your team needs and at the same time integrates into what is already setup? I help you finding your advanced process control (APC) software as well I can take over all the communication with possible partner. Furthermore I offer to write requirement specifications, do first sample testing and support its rollout.
ProcessControlPage.advanced-process-control-list-element2: • User training - Are you looking forward to standardize the way advanced process control (APC) is used in your company? I provide a platform based training for you or your team to make it become a solid common ground of expertise for further steps. It has a step-based approach and starts with general advanced process control (APC) ideas and rises to advanced approaches and specific topics that can also involve the software that you are using.
ProcessControlPage.advanced-process-control-list-element3: • Mathematics - Not every measured signal from a sensor is automatically ready to be used in an advanced process control (APC) environment. Math can be applied to create new or more reliable sources for your advanced process control (APC) landscape. As well it can be used for limit calculations and violation rules like n of m. I do raw data analysis, signal optimization, limit-based calculations, outlier handling and apply whatever math is necessary wherever needed to get more out of the control mechanism advanced process control (APC) shall be.
ProcessControlPage.advanced-process-control-list-element4: • Strategic alignment - Typically advanced process control (APC) is not used as only measure of control in a modern production. It shall be part of an ecosystem. But how does the advanced process control (APC) -piece fit into that ecosystem and what expectations does it have to fulfill? Is it doing what it shall do? The view of an outsider on strategic topics can be a blessing. That´s where I step in.
ProcessControlPage.advanced-process-control-list-element5: • Learning from the past - Data can tell stories, if asked correctly. Analyzing it and find correlations to certain events is not always straight forward and sometimes needs more time. Time that is precious within your team. Hand this topic over to me and get answer to the your questions.
ProcessControlPage.advanced-process-control-list-element6: • artificial intelligence (AI) assistance - The buzzword of today: artificial intelligence (AI). It´s a powerful tool for analyzing your data. I can help you finding the correct model for doing the job, run tests and help implementing a solution that fits your needs including all the communication and procurement procedure upfront.
ProcessControlPage.advanced-process-control-list-element7: • New setup - Are you about to make the first steps into the world of advanced process control (APC)? Or are you planing to increase the coverage of your already existing advanced process control (APC) setup? Together we can evaluate a bunch of strategies and then decide the way to go to fit your house and processes. I also help you searching for adequate measurement systems, sensors and where to place them in order to monitor as good as possible whats of interest.
ProcessControlPage.advanced-process-control-list-element8: • External software utilization - For reasons it may sometimes makes sense that you analyze gathered data with external tools. One of these tools could be one of the vast Python libraries like Pandas, Matplotlib, Numpy or SciPy. With them I can help you while you don´t have to bother with freeing up resources in order to learn something new for just one project. And if its not related to Python we´ll also figure out what to do.
ProcessControlPage.statistical-process-control-list-element: • Software procurement and setup - You already have lots of measurement data of your manufacturing processes available but you lack a centralized software that is providing what your team needs and at the same time integrates into what is already setup? I help you finding your statistical process control (SPC) software as well I can take over all the communication with possible partner. Furthermore I offer to write requirement specifications, do first sample testing and support its rollout.

• User training - Are you looking forward to standardize the way statistical process control (SPC) is used in your company? I provide a platform based training for you or your team to make it become a solid common ground of expertise for further steps. It has a step-based approach and starts with general statistical process control (SPC) concepts and rises to advanced approaches and specific topics that can also involve the software that you are using.

• WER implementation - I´d consider the western electric rules (WER) a backbone of statistical process control (SPC). Rolling out statistical process control (SPC) on millions of data channels can not be overseen and managed by hand, that´s for sure. If you plan to do so and need expertise about setting limits: I can help you here.

• Strategic alignment - Typically advanced process control (APC) is not used as only measure of control in a modern production. It shall be part of an ecosystem. But how does the advanced process control (APC) -piece fit into that ecosystem and what expectations does it have to fulfill? Is it doing what it shall do? The view of an outsider on strategic topics can be a blessing. That´s where I step in.

• Learning from the past - Data can tell stories, if asked correctly. Analyzing it and find correlations to certain events is not always straight forward and sometimes needs more time. Time that is precious within your team. Hand this topic over to me and get answer to the your questions.

• AI assistance - The buzzword of today: AI. It´s a powerful tool for analyzing your data. I can help you finding the correct model for doing the job, run tests and help implementing a solution that fits your needs including all the communication and procurement procedure upfront.

• New setup - Are you about to make the first steps into the world of advanced process control (APC)? Or are you planing to increase the coverage of your already existing advanced process control (APC) setup? Together we can evaluate a bunch of strategies and then decide the way to go to fit your house and processes. I also help you searching for adequate measurement systems, sensors and where to place them in order to monitor as good as possible whats of interest.

• External software utilization - For reasons it may sometimes makes sense that you analyze gathered data with external tools. One of these tools could be one of the vast Python libraries like Pandas, Matplotlib, Numpy or SciPy. With them I can help you while you don´t have to bother with freeing up resources in order to learn something new for just one project. And if its not related to Python I´m ready to delve into other environments as well, just let me know.
ProcessControlPage.custom-solutions-list-element1: • Python-based data analysis - Libraries like Pandas, Matplotlib, Numpy or SciPy are well established in the realm of data science. This service is especially meant to support where not much samples are collected to have APC or SPC with day to day samples. Or the analysis requirements differ from the established procedure.
ProcessControlPage.custom-solutions-list-element2: • Data classification - Are you dealing with a new data type or quality and do not yet know how to make it fit your established catalog of classifications? Or did you just update your failure catalog and need someone to perform a re-classification of existing data? Even though I won´t do this by myself I help you search qualified 3rd parties to do the job.
ProcessControlPage.custom-solutions-list-element3: • Data creation and prototyping - You need a demo or sample of data prepared in a one-time manner? It shall be connected within an highly integrated process landscape where lots of things depend on one another in feedback loops? Something needs to be responsive in almost real-time? This is where engineering can shine and you can save your resources and let me do that for you. I
ProcessControlPage.custom-solutions-list-element4: • Maintenance and review - The process control tools you use are historically grown and need a review or a restructuring? You use manual manpower to maintain these tools? Whatever it is, outsource it and let an experienced helping hand do that for you.
ProcessControlPage.process-control-contact:
Miss something? We´ll find a solution. Primary I offer my services
 for manufacturing processes, and in particular semiconductor
 manufacturing. But I am absolutely open for new topics. My
 services can be booked in both ways: short and long term. And I
 work either project or time based. As well you can combine any of
 my services to get the best result.

TravelServicesPage.travel-services-section-title: The world can be your playground - use it
TravelServicesPage.travel-services-section-subtitle:
Even though I am not a travel agent I can look up everything for
              you and put it together so you can easily decide what suites your
              booking. Here you can rely on me:
TravelServicesPage.travel-buddy-list-element1: • Have fun: I am also a human
TravelServicesPage.travel-services-contact:
Let's create an unforgettable experience together. I provide you
              what is necessary for it. Only the booking is yours. Is anything
              missing? We find a solution. It all starts here:

TheoryPage.theory-section-title:
Doing it is nice! But understanding things is the key for
              sustainable progress
TheoryPage.theory-section-subtitle:
The following is a overview of categories for theory lessons I
              give that are either already part of a course or can be booked
              additionally.
TheoryPage.rider-essentials-list-element1:
• Behavior on and around the water: Concepts like karma and
                  the right of way
TheoryPage.rider-essentials-list-element2:
• Concepts to understand wind: Where it comes from and how you
                  can use it
TheoryPage.rider-essentials-list-element3: • Self management and routines: Learn to educate yourself
TheoryPage.rider-essentials-list-element4: • General (sailing and Navigation) terminology and expressions
TheoryPage.rider-essentials-list-element6: • Common mistakes and how to avoid them
TheoryPage.advanced-theory-list-element1: • What makes you ride: Concepts of forces and angels
TheoryPage.advanced-theory-list-element2:
• More physics: What are aerodynamics and what wind really is
                  and where it comes from
TheoryPage.advanced-theory-list-element3:
• Overview and details to used materials such boards,
                  wetsuits or kites
TheoryPage.advanced-theory-list-element4: • How do tricks and maneuvers work: A brake down
TheoryPage.advanced-theory-list-element5:
• Next steps in kiteboarding: Additional exercises, lifestyle
                  and nutrition
TheoryPage.environmental-stuff-list-element1:
• Environmental influences like what is weather and how you
                  can learn to use it to your advantage
TheoryPage.environmental-stuff-list-element2:
• We are not alone: Learn about the ecosystems where you
                  perform your sport. Do you know that birds can die because of
                  you?
TheoryPage.environmental-stuff-list-element3:
• Kiteboarding on society level: How can you join an
                  organisation to serve a higher purpose related to kiteboarding
TheoryPage.environmental-stuff-list-element4:
• Laws, regulations and good habits that must be considered
                  when leaving the comfort zone
TheoryPage.theory-contact:
"A course is good if both, the student and the teacher, learn from
              each other". Combine my services as you please and benefit from an
              individual discount. Something is not listed? I´m always open to
              research something and bring it to you.

StartingPage.starting-section-title: Everything is starting somewhen. Or starting again?
StartingPage.starting-section-subtitle:
It´s about committing oneself to make the necessary steps:
              Deciding to (re-)start something and not just dreaming about is
              the first. For the ones to come I have the following flexible
              course service available:
StartingPage.who-list-element3: • Courses in German, English and Portuguese
StartingPage.who-list-element6: • No age limits but more then 30kg of weight
StartingPage.who-list-element7: • Must be able to swim securely for more then a few minutes
StartingPage.who-list-element8: • Starter = You never used a kite before in your life
StartingPage.who-list-element9: • Restarter = You used a kite before in your life
StartingPage.content-list-element6: • Water start fundamentals and first few meters
StartingPage.content-list-element8: • Orientation on the water and dangers
StartingPage.content-list-element9:
• Student can safely practice water starts on their own after
                  the course
StartingPage.structure-list-element2:
• Flexible scheduling options, based on environmental and
                  personal conditions
StartingPage.structure-list-element6: • If available: Headset and video support
StartingPage.structure-list-element8:
• No-wind alternatives: Simulations, wakeboarding,
                  landboarding, SUP, exercising,....
StartingPage.starting-contact:
There are many things to consider when giving courses but nothing
              that can´t be arranged. Drop me a message and we´ll organize all
              the details.

AdvancedPage.advanced-section-title: After the first step comes the next. And then the next...

Why does that look so easy what they are doing on the water? There

              way:

AdvancedPage.who-list-element6: • No age limits but more then 30kg of weight

I´m ready to support your school. Consider me as the one guy you
              literally can put anywhere: Flexibility is my strength. Just tell
              me up front what you need:
SchoolSupportPage.general-assistance-list-element7: • Helping hand in day to day tasks
SchoolSupportPage.flexible-scheduling-list-element2: • The more you book, the better the price
SchoolSupportPage.flexible-scheduling-list-element5:
• Providing support to multi-location schools and open to
                  commuting between sites.
SchoolSupportPage.flexible-scheduling-list-element6: • Driver’s license covering both car and motorcycle.

Let's see how I can support your team. Combine my services as you
              wish, there are almost no restrictions. Is anything missing? We

ConsultingPage.consulting-section-title: There is a lot to ask
ConsultingPage.consulting-section-subtitle:
Guidance and knowledge exchange is the key: Someone knows
              something and someone wants to learn it. Here I combine my role as
              a kitesurfer and -instructor with being part of society.
ConsultingPage.general-consulting-list-element5: • Karma: Influence on society and the environment
ConsultingPage.sport-representation-list-element1: • Public speaking and presentations about sport related topics
ConsultingPage.sport-representation-list-element2: • Educational workshops for almost all ages
ConsultingPage.sport-representation-list-element3: • Media interviews and content, also for B2B
ConsultingPage.consulting-contact:
This section revolves around anything that is somehow connected to
              the sport as well to the environment in which it´s carried out.
              Find out how we can work together:
